title: EWU Professor Awarded Prestigious Grant for AI in Healthcare Research
summary: Dr. Fatima Ahmed from EWU's CSE department has secured a significant research grant to spearhead a project on leveraging Artificial Intelligence for early disease detection in remote healthcare settings.

title: EWU Announces Dates for Annual CSE Fest 2024
summary: The highly anticipated EWU CSE Fest 2024 is scheduled for March 10-12, featuring programming contests, project showcases, gaming competitions, and tech talks. Registrations open soon!

title: State-of-the-Art Cybersecurity Lab Inaugurated at EWU
summary: East West University has unveiled a new, advanced Cybersecurity Lab equipped with the latest tools and technologies to provide students with hands-on experience in network security and ethical hacking.

title: EWU CSE Alumni Association Announces Annual Meetup
summary: The EWU CSE Alumni Association invites all graduates to the annual grand meetup on December 15th, 2023, for an evening of networking, reminiscence, and celebration.

title: EWU Robotics Club Hosts 'Intro to Arduino' Workshop
summary: The EWU Robotics Club successfully conducted a hands-on workshop for beginners on Arduino programming and basic robotics, attracting a large number of enthusiastic students.
